alert.note: Alert for Gadsden; Inland Jefferson; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 10 at 2:21PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Gadsden, Jefferson and northeastern Leon Counties through 300 PM EST... At 221 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 14 miles west of Monticello to Midway. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Monticello, Florida State University, Midway, Tallahassee Community College, Florida A and M, Havana, Doak Campbell Stadium, Alma, Tallahassee Memorial Hosp, Miccosukee, Griffin Heights, Drifton, Governors Square Mall, Midtown, Lake Miccosukee, Levy Park, Indian Head Acres, Chaires Crossroads and Festus. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
